title: Can I able to pursue one regular degree and one distance degree through IGNOU? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for the A2A As you have read in IGNOU prospectus it is not allowed.It will be extremely difficult and close to impossible to achieve dual degree admissions.Even if you did there is the future problem probability of losing credibility to your degree.I can only suggest that if you are hell bent on learning MA Eco from IGNOU you can wait till your M,com is done and then pursue the same. Your are never late to learn.All the Best!!!
